isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS FULLER RT-610 SERIES - DISASSEMBLE - SHIFTER HOUSING

note.para: During disassembly, lay all parts on a clean bench in the order of removal to facilitate reassembly. Bars not being removed must be kept in the neutral position or interlock parts will lock bars.

step1.para: Place the housing in a vise with the plunger side up; front of housing will be to the right.

Start with the upper bar and move all bars to the right and out the front of the housing as detailed in the following instructions. Cut the lock wire and remove lockscrews from each bar just prior to its removal.
Move top shift bar to the right and out of the housing, removing the shift yoke from the bar ( Figure 60).

figure.caption: Figure 60. Move Top Shift Bar to Right and Out of Housing

step1.para: Move the center bar to the right and out of the housing, removing the shift yoke from the bar. As the neutral notch in the bar clears the front web, remove the interlock pin from the bore in the neutral notch ( Figure 61).

figure.caption: Figure 61. Remove Interlock Pin From Bore in Neutral Notch

step1.para: Remove the actuating plunger from the shifter housing ( Figure 62).

figure.caption: Figure 62. Remove Actuating Plunger From Shifter Housing

step1.para: Move the lower bar to the right and out of the housing, removing the shifting yoke from the bar ( Figure 63).

figure.caption: Figure 63. Move Lower Bar to Right and Out of Housing

step1.para: Remove the two interlock balls from the housing ( Figure 64).

figure.caption: Figure 64. Remove Interlock Balls From Housing
